name: Growth Venture Partners
tag_list: investment-banking, venture-capital, private-equity, middle-market, invest, investments, funding, finance, equity, debt, capital, advisor, mezzanine
overview:
Growth Venture Partners is a specialized middle market investment bank, with deep domain expertise that are focused primarily on private companies and its stakeholders who are seeking financing via private placements or strategic investments, as well as liquidity via the secondary market or M&A. The Firm’s distinguished services are unique in its robust network of institutional and strategic investors, as well as its capabilities of combining timely execution of transactions, creative deal structuring, complex negotiations, perceptive market insight and in-depth qualitative and quantitative analyses.

Growth Venture Partners builds strong credibility with its investor and corporate clients through a commitment of delivering top tier investment banking services. As a trusted advisor, the Firm adheres to high standards and places strong emphasis on establishing long-term relationships with investor and corporate clients, originating value-add ideas that help achieve strategic objectives and maximize shareholder value, and performing world-class execution that yields timely results.

Additionally, Growth Venture Partners maintains a comprehensive database of fundamental industry knowledge and framework of sectors and sub-sectors, which are used to identify forward-looking trends and drivers, track emerging companies and strategic opportunities, and originate unique ideas that help define the future of the market.
